title: sour sardines (Tagliatelle alle sarde in saor)
description: Giorgio Locatelli suggests a hearty take on this classic dish of marinated sardines, bulked out with homemade pasta.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
10 medium-sized sardines, scales removed, gutted, filleted, heads removed
2 tbsp sultanas, soaked in water for 30 minutes
